mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation_info( product_id, display_info_id, reservation_name, reservation_tel, reservation_email, reservation_date, cancel_flag, create_date, modify_date) SELECT p.id, d.id, #{name}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{reservationDate}, 0, NOW(), NOW() FROM display_info AS d INNER JOIN product AS p ON d.product_id = p.id WHERE d.id = #{displayInfoId} GROUP BY p.id

INSERT INTO reservation_info_price( reservation_info_id, product_price_id, count) VALUES
(#{item.reservationInfoId}, #{item.priceInfoId}, #{item.count})
